line.text: Thou art as tyrannous so as thou art
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As those whose beauties proudly make them cruel
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For well thou know to my dear doting heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou art the fairest and most precious jewel
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet in good faith some say that thee behold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy face hath not the power to make love groan
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To say they err I dare not be so bold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Although I swear it to my self alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to be sure that is not false I swear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A thousand groans but thinking on thy face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: One on another neck do witness bear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy black is fairest in my judgment place
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In nothing art thou black save in thy deeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And thence this slander as I think proceeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
